summary: An Ordinance amending Section 3 of Ordinance No. 22839, entitled "An Ordinance to regulate plumbing and gas and steam fitting in the City of Seattle, providing for the issuance of permits therefor, for testing and inspecting same and for fees to be charged for such inspection, providing for the compensation of buildings and structures unit for human habitation, providing penalties for violations of the provisions of this ordinance, and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith", approved December 29, 1909.
